thread.section_title: Smooth Hotel Rome Termini - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nothing but Fantastic!
thread.title_full: Nothing but Fantastic! - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Samantha Y
title: Nothing but Fantastic!
text: You must stay here if in Rome. The hotel is beautiful, the staff fantastic and the breakfast delicious. 5 stars is not enough! The staff willingly stored our luggage after our morning arrival and already had it waiting in the room when we checked in. It doesn't get much better than that.
